annotations:
Dear All

 

Pls pps for our vessel as below:

 

MV

 PRINCESS MARIA  55K, OPEN JEBEL ALI 1-5TH/SEP,
BOD abt 500-600mt LSFO ; abt 40-50mt LSMGO,

 

TRY ANY INCLUDING PERIOD

HOLDS GRAIN CLEAN(DRYDOCK IN JUNE, 2024)

2*25MT, DECK/HATCH, GOA TRANSIT – OK

NICKEL ORE FRIENDLY

 

MV PRINCESS MARIA
SUMMER DWT - 55414 ON 12.87M
TPC - 57.1 ON SUMMER DWT
BUILT - JULY  2009
YARD - HYUNDAI VINASHIN, VIETNAM
HO/HA - 5 / 5
GEAR - 4 X 30 MT (HOOK) - 4 X 24 MT (GRAB) MACGREGOR ELECTRIC / HYDRAULIC
GRABS - 12.5 M3 CRANES MAY NOT BE USED IN HOOK MODE WITH GRABS ATTACHED.
LOA - 187.88 BEAM 32.26
CO2 FITTED / NO A60 BULKHEAD


SPEED/CONSUMPTION AS VESSEL TRADING AT OPEN SEA FOR 24 HOURS:
ABT 12.0 KNOTS BALLAST ABT 24.5 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.2 MT LSMGO
ABT 11.5 KNOTS LADEN ABT 25.0 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.2 MT LSMGO


PORT IDLE : ABT 3.0 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.2 MT LSMGO
PORT WORKING : ABT 5.0 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.2 MT LSMGO


"ABT” MEANS AN ALLOWANCE OF +/-0.5KN ON SPEED AND 5PCT ON CONSUMPTION 

 


ALL ABOVE SPEED/CONSUMPTIONS ARE GIVEN FROM BEGINNING TO END OF SEA PASSAGE, AT OPEN SEA, NOT EXCEEDING SUMMER DRAFT, UNDER GOOD WEATHER CONDITION NAMELY, 24 CONSECUTIVE HOURS (FROM NOON TO NOON), NO ADVERSE CURRENT, NO NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL, BEAUFORT SCALE MAX 4, DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 (MEANS SIGNIFICANT WAVE HEIGHT LESS THAN 1.25 METRES), EXTRAPOLATION OF “GOOD WEATHER” PERFORMANCE FOR “BAD WEATHER” PERIODS IS NOT ALLOWED, POSITIVE CURRENT FACTOR ON SHIP'S FAVOR.

ALWAYS EXCLUDING ANY VOYAGE LESS THAN 48 HOURS TRANSIT TIME FROM SEA PILOT TO SEA PILOT, SAILING IN PIRACY AREAS, IN CONGESTION, IN REDUCED VISIBILITY, MANEUVERING OR SAILING IN SHALLOW/RESTRICTED WATERS, STRAITS, RIVERS, CANALS, WHEN APPROACHING /ENTERING/LEAVING PORTS AND WHEN LOADED WITH DECK CARGO.

THE VESSEL HAS LIBERTY TO BURN EXTRA VLSFO/LSMGO IN CASE OF EMERGENCY, EXCHANGING BALLAST WATER AT SEA, HEATING FUEL IN COLD WEATHER, HOLD CLEANING, MAINTENANCE, MANOEUVRING, SAILING IN SHALLOW/NARROW/CONFINED WATERS, STRAITS, RIVERS, CANAL, ENTERING/LEAVING PORTS, IN HEAVY WEATHER CONDITION AND WHEREVER NECESSARY. COST AND TIME (INCLUDING ANY DEVIATION TIME REQUIRED TO MEET SECA REQUIREMENTS AND/OR REGULATIONS IN OPERATION PORTS TO WHICH VESSEL IS BOUND) INCL BALLAST EXCHANGE TO BE FOR CHARTERERS' ACCOUNT. 

CHARTERERS TO SUPPLY BUNKERS WITH SPECIFICATIONS IN ACCORDANCE WITH VLSFO (SULFUR 0.5% MAX)

ISO 8217: 2017 RMG380 AND LSMGO(SULFUR 0.1% MAX) ISO 8217:2017 DMA, IF ISO 8217:2017 NOT AVAILABLE, ISO 8217: 2010 TO APPLY. BIMCO 2020 MARINE FUEL SULPHUR CONTENT CLAUSE FOR TIME CAHRTER PARTIES TO BE INCORPORATED INTO THIS CP.

ADA
